## FocusToggle (component)

The FocusToggle puts the ParticipantTile in focus or removes it from focus.

### Import

```typescript
import { FocusToggle } from '@livekit/components-react';
```

## Usage

```tsx
<ParticipantTile>
  <FocusToggle />
</ParticipantTile>
```

## Properties

| Property                                                           | Modifiers | Type         | Description  |
| ------------------------------------------------------------------ | --------- | ------------ | ------------ |
| [participant?](./components-react.focustoggleprops.participant.md) |           | Participant  | _(Optional)_ |
| [trackSource](./components-react.focustoggleprops.tracksource.md)  |           | Track.Source |              |
